amendment.description: To increase funding for certain education and related programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 1547 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1547 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 48. Record Vote Number: 322.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1547.
Amendment SA 1547 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S10992-11000, S11001-11003; text: CR S10992-10993) To increase funding for certain education and related programs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1547 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 48. Record Vote Number: 322.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1547 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1542.
